mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO tcontactor( contactor_name, contactor_mobile, create_time, modify_time, password, creator_id, customer_id, contactor_level ) values ( #{contactor.contactorName}, #{contactor.contactorMobile}, sysdate(), sysdate(), #{contactor.password}, #{contactor.creatorId}, #{contactor.customerId}, #{contactor.contactorLevel});
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS contactorId
